document.full_text: u-prince  - colombian pop star shakira pledged $400,000 on thursday to help rebuild a school for girls in haiti that was severely damaged during the country's devastating earthquake last year.
document.title: shakira helps rebuild quake-hit haiti girls school
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - colombian pop star shakira pledged $400,000 on thursday to help rebuild a school for girls in haiti that was severely damaged during the country's devastating earthquake last year.
